title: Artiphon Orba Handheld Musical Instrument
description: The Artiphon Orba Handheld Musical Instrument, which also serves as a portable controller fits in the palm of your hand and acts as a synth, loop, and controller. In fact, it has a built-in synthesizer that responds to your touch and creates music with its integrated speaker. Additionally, this handheld instrument lets you layer lead, drum, chord, and bass parts to make songs instantly.
